settings.couponDisclaimer: Note: "{0}" added to basket. Our application will automatically choose the best discount at any level.
settings.filterConfiguration: [{"name": "Color","enable": true,"key": "tenant~COLOR","showCount": false,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "swatch"}},{"name": "Size","enable": true,"key": "tenant~SIZE","showCount": false,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "Text"}},{"name": "Styles","enable": true,"key": "tenant~STYLES","showCount": false,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "Text"}},{"name": "ProductType","enable": false,"key": "tenant~PRODUCTTYPE","showCount": false,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 3,"type": "text"}},{"name": "Materials","enable": true,"key": "tenant~MATERIALS","showCount": false,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "Text"}},{"name": "Ratings","enable": true,"key": "tenant~RATINGS","showCount": true,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "Stars"},"values": [5,4,3,2,1]},{"name": "Price","enable": true,"key": "price","showCount": true,"definition": {"showMoreCount": 0,"type": "PriceBreak"},"values": [{"lo": 0,"hi": 29.99,"Format": "$HI and under"},{"lo": 30,"hi": 49.99,"Format": "$LO - $HI"},{"lo": 50,"hi": 99.99,"Format": "$LO - $HI"},{"lo": 100,"hi": 199.99,"Format": "$LO - $HI"},{"lo": 200,"hi": 999999.99,"Format": "$LO +"}]}]
settings.deliverySurchargeContent: Bulky items such as furniture and rugs cost more to ship due to greater size and weight. Therefore, a delivery surcharge will be billed in addition to the standard shipping charge.Surcharge amounts vary. The surcharge amount is noted on each product detail page.
settings.multipleCouponMsg: Coupon Code of greater discount is already applied
